channel.title: VenganceScape Client V2 Prob
channel.description:
OK im working on Running Javas client VenganceScape V2 and whenever I try to test it the server run works fine but this is what the client run says [code]Vengance scape client
~~~~~~Custom Item Cache client~~~~~~
Exception in thread "AWT-Windows" java.lang.NullPointerException Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method479(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:1301) at Class46.method581(Class46.java:289) at Class46.method578(Class46.java:131) at Class7.method175(Unknown Source) at Class7.method190(Unknown Source) at client.method22(client.java:511) at client.method54(client.java:2609) at client.method53(client.java:2557) at client.method62(client.java:3026) at client.method7(client.java:2058) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4492) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] HUH??!

item.title: VenganceScape Client V2 Prob
item.dc:creator: @karuto karuto
item.description:
@karuto wrote:

ok[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 08:58:22 PM[/size][hr]It works!!

item.title: VenganceScape Client V2 Prob
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“karuto, post:8, topic:159786”]Lemme try that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 08:16:29 PM[/size][hr]DID NOT WORK…

Heres my run:

@echo off title Run set CLASSPATH= java client[/quote]

make it

@echo off title Run set CLASSPATH= java -Xmx500m client

item.title: VenganceScape Client V2 Prob

item.description:
@karuto wrote:

OK im working on Running Javas client VenganceScape V2 and whenever I try to test it the server run works fine but this is what the client run says

[code]Vengance scape client

Custom Item Cache client

Exception in thread “AWT-Windows” java.lang.NullPointerException
Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method479(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:1301)
